title: Calum joined Morgan Lab!
content: One more member for Morgan Lab, Calum is a new PhD student and will be working with Dr. Mike Morgan and Dr. Candice Quinn on age-related immune remodelling!

title: Welcome David!
content: In a veritable tsunami of new lab members, Dr David Wragg joins the lab as a postdoc, jointly with Dr Eunchai Kang's group, to work on single-cell analysis of a cerebral organoid model of Alzheimer' disease onset. Welcome David!

title: Haries was at Ascona 2025!
content: Haries attended the Modern Benchmarking: Advancing Computational Methods in Molecular Biology conference in Ascona, Switzerland (March 23–27), where he presented benCCChmarker—a Python framework for standardized benchmarking of cell-to-cell communication inference algorithms. Excellent work, Haries!

title: Mike and Calum shine at SIGNET 2025!
content: Mike and Calum made a strong impression at the SIGNET 2025 conference in Perth, Scotland, on March 27th. Mike as an invited speaker presenting his work on 'Single-Cell Genetics Reveals Cell State Drivers of Immune-Mediated Disease' and Calum with his engaging poster on 'Age-Related Gut Microbiome Alterations and Their Role in Clonal Haematopoiesis-Driven Immune Remodelling.' Fantastic work from both!
